Module for loading Quran data from a text file. Parses each line into a dictionary containing surah number, ayah number, and verse text, and handles file not found errors gracefully.

functions.name: load_quran_text
functions.description: Load Quran text from a file. Reads the file line by line, parses lines formatted as 'surah_number|ayah_number|verse_text' into dictionaries, and returns a list of these dictionaries. Handles FileNotFoundError by printing an error message.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the Quran text file.

files.description: This module provides search utility functions to perform various queries on Quran data. It supports searching for individual words, word groups, and counting occurrences within specified verse ranges and surahs, with options for case-sensitive or case-insensitive matching.

functions.name: search_word_in_quran
functions.description: Searches for a word in the Quran verses. Iterates over the provided Quran data, checking if the search_word is present in each verse. Supports both case-sensitive and case-insensitive searches.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing the Quran data.

parameters.name: search_word
parameters.description: The word to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag indicating if the search should be case sensitive; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_group
functions.description: Searches for a specific word group (phrase) in the Quran verses by iterating over the Quran data and checking for an exact phrase match with optional case sensitivity.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing the Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag indicating if the search should be case sensitive; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_in_surah
functions.description: Searches for a word within a specified Surah in the Quran data, returning verses where the word is found. Performs a case-insensitive search.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search for.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number in which to search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing the Quran data.

functions.name: search_word_group_in_surah
functions.description: Searches for a specific word group (phrase) within a given Surah in the Quran data. Supports both case-sensitive and case-insensitive searches.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing the Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to search for.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number to filter the verses.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag indicating if the search should be case sensitive; defaults to False.

functions.name: count_word_occurrences
functions.description: Counts the total number of occurrences of a given word in the Quran data in a case-insensitive manner.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing the Quran data.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word whose occurrences need to be counted.

functions.name: count_word_group_occurrences
functions.description: Counts the total number of non-overlapping occurrences of a word group (phrase) in the Quran data. The search is performed in a case-insensitive manner.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing the Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to count occurrences of.

functions.name: search_word_in_verse_range
functions.description: Searches for a word within a specified verse range in the Quran data. Uses tuple boundaries for verses and supports case-sensitive and case-insensitive searches.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing the Quran data.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search for.

parameters.name: start_verse
parameters.description: A tuple representing the starting verse as (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: end_verse
parameters.description: A tuple representing the ending verse as (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag indicating if the search should be case sensitive; defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_group_in_verse_range
functions.description: Searches for a word group (phrase) within a specified verse range in the Quran data. Iterates over verses with boundaries and supports case sensitivity.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing the Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to search for.

parameters.name: start_verse
parameters.description: A tuple representing the starting verse as (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: end_verse
parameters.description: A tuple representing the ending verse as (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag indicating if the search should be case sensitive; defaults to False.
